name: Rush
description: Gucci Rush by Gucci is a Chypre Fruity fragrance for women. Gucci Rush was launched in 1999. The nose behind this fragrance is Michel Almairac.

name: Eros
description: Eros is the fragrance that interprets the sublime masculinity through a luminous aura with an intense, vibrant and glowing freshness

name: Mademoiselle
description: An intense facet of the COCO MADEMOISELLE personality emerges to forge a powerful, deep floral-woody fragrance that is irresistible in every way.
